english: Nothing was cured by the shooting .
chinese: 开枪杀人并不能改善任何现状。

english: I always wanted to do the killing part .
chinese: 我老想扮演杀人的角色。

english: He's a killer, a thoroughly evil type .
chinese: 他是个杀人凶手，特别狠毒的那一类。

english: We started in chase of the murderer .
chinese: 我们开始追击杀人凶手。

english: A charlatan does n't murder with a knife .

chinese: 杀人造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: You could go to prison for murder .
chinese: 你会因为杀人而坐牢的！

english: Hitler was as great a butcher as the world has seen .
chinese: 希特勒是有史以来最大的杀人狂。

english: Look it, the dirty little sneak-the murderer .
chinese: 你们看，这个肮脏家伙，这个杀人的凶手。

english: The words of rousseau had turned into the bloody machine .
chinese: 卢梭的言论变成了杀人的武器。

english: You are told not to murder, but you worship murderers .
chinese: 不许你杀人，你崇拜的却是杀人凶手。

english: Happily, the minds of englishmen have an horror of murder .
chinese: 幸亏英国人对杀人害命深恶痛绝。

english: The western world was indeed black with homicidal monomania .
chinese: 西方世界的确被杀人狂抹黑了。

english: He wanted to swear and to smash and to murder .
chinese: 他真恨不得要破口大骂，要捣毁这个地方，要杀人。

english: He was prosecuted and executed for murder just the same .
chinese: 他很可能照样因为杀人罪被起诉，被处死。

english: As the murderer was at large, people were afraid to go out .
chinese: 因为杀人儿犯尚未被逮到，人们很怕出门。
